Title: Relates to value-based care for maternity coverage
Summary: Requires contracts for insurance and medical assistance to provide value-based care for maternity coverage; defines value-based care as an arrangement that financially rewards certain positive outcomes and financially penalizes certain negative outcomes.
LawCode: Amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L; amd §4406, Pub Health L; amd §162, Civ Serv L; amd §364-j, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, the public health law, the civil service law and the social services law, in relation to value-based care for maternity coverage
